text:
June US, 1962
Mr. E. G. Burrows
Manager, mm
Administration Binding
Ann Arbor, Michigan
Bear 0d:
I think your plans for a meeting to consider music programming on
educational stations is excellent.
t don’t know, at this time, of any other meetings which might tend to
conflict with your scheduled dates of November 6-7. I hope that
your meeting can also consider the matter of musical programs on the
NAKB network and how more, and better ones, might be obtained.
Incidentally, if ycm don’t hear from Jim (at least personally) for
some time, it’s because he left last week for a vacation of several
weeks.
Begards,
BaroM £« Hill
Vice President
HSK/mlm
